name: The Original Silver Lingerie, Wedding Dress Hanger
description:
Perfect for that wedding dress photo! (and the lingerie for later that night…)

Measure approx 15 inches across bottom. handmade. 

I can fit up to 14 characters. Each space is considered one character, and a heart is considered two characters.

PLEASE LEAVE  PERSONALIZATION AND DATE NEEDED IN THE NOTE TO SELLER SECTION IN PAYPAL!! :) In the "Review your info" section, underneath the shipping address and just above the "payment method" there is a small line that says "Note to seller: Add" Please click "add" and write the personalization and date needed. Thank you!

Everything is written in all lowercase. If you'd like certain letters capitalized, a period, a comma, or an apostrophe, please contact me to make sure I can work it into your individual piece. If you'd like two first names, please indicate whether you'd like a "+," "&," or a "heart" between the names.  Please, no hyphens, dashes, or "floating" characters. Thanks!

---There is currently a wait period so please allow 5 to 6 weeks before item ships as each hanger is handmade upon request. Please keep in mind, nothing ships until payment has been received. I work as fast as I can, but do need time to maintain quality (and sanity) I appreciate your patience. Thank you so much!!---

These hangers have been featured in:
Martha Stewart Weddings,
Victoria's Secret, 
At Home Tennessee, 
Southern Living Weddings, 
The Knot,
Style Me Pretty,
and others! :)


Not recommended for storage of dress.
Not recommended for very heavy garments. These are each handmade, literally, as in no machines, so please keep in mind the metal is malleable. 

Any questions, please contact me!


ALL IMAGES, ARTWORK, AND DESIGNS ARE PROTECTED UNDER INTERNATIONAL COPYRIGHT LAW. TO COPY OR REPRODUCE WITHOUT PRIOR WRITTEN AUTHORIZATION IS INFRINGEMENT OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS AND COPYRIGHT! © 2008 LILAFRANCES™ All Rights Reserved THANK YOU FOR RESPECTING MY IDEAS AND DESIGNS.

Thank You for Supporting the Original Designer of Personalized Wire Wedding Hangers™!

name: Personalized Length of Silver Wire
description:
This listing is for one piece of wire THE WIRE ONLY with your name or word of choice twisted into it! 

There is 10 inches of pliable extra wire on either side of your name/word of choice (limit of 14 characters please) for you to use to attach the name piece wherever/however you want to whatever item you choose! Everything is written in all lowercase with no punctuation unless you specify otherwise on your order.

Attach to a wooden hanger for wedding dress pics!
Get one for each of your bridesmaids!

Attach it to a door or wall as decoration!

The possibilities are endless. :)

Please let me know what you'd like the wire to say in the note to seller section during checkout. If you have trouble locating this area, please see the policies/faq section for detailed instructions.

Due to handmade nature of item, please allow 5 to 6 weeks to receive. Thank you for your patience. 

Very basic instructions are included as to how to attach to a hanger but how you use the wire is limited only by your imagination!
Excess wire can be easily clipped off with a pliers/wire cutters after you've attached it to your item of choice.

name: The Original Twelve Inch Personalized Wire Hanger
description:
This item differs from The Original Silver Lingerie, Wedding Dress Hanger in that it is 12" across the bottom as opposed to 15" and can only fit 10 characters. It is equal in strength as it uses the same wire. Thank you!


Measures approx 12 inches across bottom. Completely made by hand so each one is unique. 

PLEASE LEAVE  PERSONALIZATION AND DATE NEEDED IN THE NOTE TO SELLER SECTION IN PAYPAL!! :) In the "Review your info" section, underneath the shipping address and just above the "payment method" there is a small line that says "Note to seller: Add" Please click "add" and write the personalization and date needed. Thank you!

No more than 10 characters please. (each space counts as a character and hearts count as two) Everything is written in all lowercase. Please, no hyphens or dashes. If you'd like certain letters capitalized, a period, a comma, or an apostrophe, please contact me first to make sure I can work it into your individual piece.

---There is a waiting list so please allow 5 to 6 weeks before item ships as each hanger is handmade upon request. Please keep in mind, nothing ships until payment has been received.
